## PuzzleSession.cageContainsValue() method

Determines if some [cage](./ts-sudoku-lib.icage.md) contains a specific value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cageContainsValue(spec: string | ICage, value: number): boolean;
```

</th><th>

Type

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

A `string` ([CageId](./ts-sudoku-lib.cageid.md)<!-- -->) or [ICage](./ts-sudoku-lib.icage.md) indicating the cage to be tested.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

value


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The value to be tested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the cage exists and contains the specified value, `false` otherwise.
